column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Happy to have found this gem in our trip to Chicago! When we went to Chi
column2: we were expecting to have an amazing deep dish pizza anywhere we went. Sadly
column3: we were disappointed! Almost all of the pies we had were just "okay"....except this one. We went with the barbecue wings and a medium Chicago classic. First and foremost
column4: you need to order the WINGS... TRUST ME. The pizza was absolutely delicious
column5: and neither of us were big sausage fans. We practically ate the pan too!
